title: Indian Oil Corporation cancels green H2 tender yet again
description: IOCL's tender for the first green hydrogen plant in India was cancelled for the second time, receiving only two bids. The Panipat refinery project intended to determine green hydrogen prices. Previous tender attempts faced allegations of favorable terms for GH4India, leading to industry concerns about fairness and competitiveness.
